characterDescription:
Ashertmarn is one of the Unmade, a mysterious group of odious spren on Roshar. Also known as the Heart of the Revel, his influence leads people to excessive indulgence, which eventually leads to mindless excess, as is evidenced by members of the Cult of Moments that Shallan observes upon her entrance to the revel upon the Oathgate platform in Kholinar.
Upon her inspection of the control building of the Oathgate there, Shallan found instead an inhumanly shaped heart.
Ashertmarn was last heard by Shallan, who spoke to her.

characterDetails.Appearance: He is a dark mass that pulses and throbs. Black veins as thick as a man's leg run from it and meld with the ground nearby.
characterDetails.Characteristics: Ashertmarn is a heart ... a heart that beats an irregular rhythm, bum-ba-ba-bum, instead of the common ba-bum of Shallan's own heart.
characterDetails.Notes: Brandon has confirmed that the Unmade are Splinters of Odium. Odium splintered himself and created the Unmade to be his influence on Roshar. It is through the Unmade that Odium may be able to influence people in how they think or act.
